subtitle.Text: Steve: We didn't really give Kate very specific direction for this...
Karla: Nope! Steve: ...she gave us some...
Karla: Ref pictures. Steve: Some reference for us to approve and everything,
but when we put it into the game, again, not a request from us at all,
looking at the struts, and the shape of the windows, and how it's this sort of Deco metal structure with water outside of it, I was just like, "Welcome to Rapture!"
Karla: Oh I know, it's so true. It really is true.
Steve: It almost feels like an intentional reference. If only it were intentional.
